title: What Will the Coaching Carousel Look Like?
description:
Kevin is joined by Yahoo Sports’ Charles Robinson to discuss the upcoming coaching carousel as well as a potential Jim Harbaugh return, rookie QBs, and potential protocols for the Super Bowl. 

Host: Kevin Clark 
Guest: Charles Robinson 
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
